title: On tour with the Arts Council
creator_credit: Richard Mason, Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Arts Council of New South Wales organises touring drama, ballet and opera companies and art exhibitions throughout the State, and resident summer schools for art students in rural areas.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Mason, Jack S. Allan and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
